document_data.name: Body Clock
document_data.mainbody: '''''Body clock''''' was a [[divine magic|divine]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] from the [[time sphere]] that had multiple effects upon the target.
document_data.Effects: The target of this spell felt a reduced need for sleep, to breathe, and they could set an internal alarm clock to wake them at a specific time of their choosing.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as [[material component]]s a kernel of [[corn]], a drop of water, and a stoppered glass bottle to cast.
document_data.History: The ''[[Scepter of Mystra]]'', a relic of the [[Mystra]]n faith, could cast the ''body clock'' spell.{{cite book/Prayers from the Faithful|77-80}}
